newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia jobs assumptions conservative - govt.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia jobs assumptions conservative - govt.

text.p: Australian Prime Minster John Howard said on Wednesday his government's assumptions on unemployment were conservative.
"From the point of view of the budget, we have made conservative assumptions about unemployment," Howard told Sydney radio.
"And that means that if it is better than we have forecast in the budget, then the budget will actually be in a stronger position."
